entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Beaverlodge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -31.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Beaverlodge 08:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023
Temperature: -31.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 72 %
Dewpoint: -35.2°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon then 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Ice fog patches this morning. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:09 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. 60 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 06:09 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:09 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023
